amendment.description: Amendment extends the Department of Veterans Affairs authority for the performance of medical disability evaluations by contract physicians by one year.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 114-742 to extend the Department of Veterans Affairs authority for the performance of medical disability evaluations by contract physicians by one year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 426 - 0 (Roll no. 514).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 426 - 0 (Roll no. 514).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Takano.
